document_data.name: Seiroku Ashida
document_data.mainbody: '''Seiroku Ashida''' was a [[fighter]] in [[Kara-Tur]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|456|Seiroku Ashida}}
document_data.Personality: Seiroku desired to destroy many evil creatures in order to please his god, and he followed the lessons of the priests in his village to this end. He was highly determined and dedicated to his training.
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a ''+3 [[sword]]'' and a ''+2 [[polearm]]'' and wore [[banded mail]] and a ''[[cloak of displacement]]''. He also had a ''[[necklace of missiles]]'' and a ''[[potion of invulnerability]]''.
